TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi CheckedListBox extends System.Windows.Forms.ListBox

summary.span: 显示一个 ，其中在每项的左边显示一个复选框。

span.span: Displays a in which a check box is displayed to the left of each item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此控件显示的用户可以通过使用键盘或滚动条控件右侧导航的项的列表。This control presents a list of items that the user can navigate by using the keyboard or the scrollbar on the right side of the control. 用户可以通过将放入复选标记一个或多个项和已选中的项可以导航与和。The user can place a check mark by one or more items and the checked items can be navigated with the and . 若要在运行时将对象添加到列表，分配的对象引用与数组方法。To add objects to the list at run time, assign an array of object references with the method. 然后，该列表显示每个对象的默认字符串值。The list then displays the default string value for each object. 你可以将各个项添加到该列表与方法。You can add individual items to the list with the method. 对象支持通过三种状态枚举： ， ，和。The object supports three states through the enumeration: , , and . 必须设置的状态的在代码中的用户界面因为不提供一种机制来这样做。You must set the state of in the code because the user interface for a does not provide a mechanism to do so. 如果是`true`、将识别并展开在项的文本中，创建列的制表符字符数。If is `true`, the will recognize and expand tab characters in an item's text, creating columns. 这些选项卡停止预设了并不能更改。These tab stops are preset and cannot be changed. 若要使用自定义选项卡停止，设置到`false`，将其设置到`true`，并添加到自定义值集合。To use custom tab stops, set to `false`, set to `true`, and add the custom values to the collection. > [!NOTE] > 如果属性是`false`、将忽略属性，并将其替换为标准的制表位偏移量。If the property is `false`, the property will be ignored and replaced with standard tab offsets. 类支持以下三个索引的集合：The class supports the following three indexed collections: |集合Collection|封装类Encapsulating Class| |----------------|-------------------------| |中包含的所有项控件。All items contained in the control.|| |已选中项 （包括处于不确定状态的项），该部分项目包含在控件。Checked items (including items in an indeterminate state), which is a subset of the items contained in the control.|| |检查索引，它是项集合中的索引子集。Checked indexes, which is a subset of the indexes into the items collection. 这些索引在选中或不确定状态中指定项。These indexes specify items in a checked or indeterminate state.|| 以下三个表是三个索引集合的示例，类支持。The following three tables are examples of the three indexed collections that the class supports. 第一个表提供的控件 （包含在控件中的所有项） 中的项的索引集合的示例。The first table provides an example of the indexed collection of items in the control (all items contained in the control). |索引Index|项Item|检查状态Check State| |-----------|----------|-----------------| |00|对象 1Object 1|| |11|对象 2Object 2|| |22|对象 3Object 3|| |33|对象 4Object 4|| |44|对象 5Object 5|| 第二个表提供了已选中项的索引集合的示例。The second table provides an example of the indexed collection of the checked items. |索引Index|项Item| |-----------|----------| |00|对象 2Object 2| |11|对象 4Object 4| |22|对象 5Object 5| 第三个表提供了选中项的索引的索引集合的示例。The third table provides an example of the indexed collection of indexes of checked items. |索引Index|项的索引Index of Item| |-----------|-------------------| |00|11| |11|33| |22|44| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法、 属性和集合的。The following example illustrates how you can use the methods, properties, and collections of a . 这是准备好运行一次，你已将它复制到你的项目的完整示例。This is a complete sample ready to run once you have copied it to your project. 可以检查和取消选中项、 使用文本框中添加项和您在一次单击保存按钮，清除已选中的项。You can check and uncheck items, use the text box to add items and once you have clicked the save button, clear the checked items. [!code-cpp[Classic CheckedListBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CheckedListBox Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic CheckedListBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CheckedListBox Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic CheckedListBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CheckedListBox Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，使用和`ResizeRedraw`值指定控件在调整大小时重绘。By default, uses and the `ResizeRedraw` value of to specify that the control is redrawn when resized.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CheckedIndices As CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection

summary.span: 该 中选中索引的集合。

span.span: Collection of checked indexes in this .
The collection for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 选中的索引的集合是中的所有项的集合中的索引子集控件。The collection of checked indexes is a subset of the indexes into the collection of all items in the control. 这些索引在选中或不确定状态中指定项。These indexes specify items in a checked or indeterminate state. ## Examples 下面的示例枚举中的已选中的项若要查看内容检查项的状态处于。The following example enumerates the checked items in the to see what check state an item is in. 该示例演示如何使用属性来获取，和属性来获取。The example demonstrates using the property to get the , and the property to get the . 第一个循环使用方法以获取的每个选中的项，给定项的索引。The first loop uses the method to get the of each checked item, given the index of the item. 第二个循环也使用，但使用方法来检索项的索引。The second loop also uses , but uses the method to retrieve the index for the item. [!code-cpp[CheckedListBox#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CheckedListBox/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[CheckedListBox#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CheckedListBox/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CheckedListBox#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CheckedListBox/VB/source.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CheckedItems As CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection

summary.span: 该 中选中项的集合。

span.span: Collection of checked items in this .
The collection for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合是中的对象的子集的项集合，表示只有是`Checked`或`Indeterminate`。The collection is a subset of the objects in the collection, representing only those items whose is `Checked` or `Indeterminate`. 此集合中的索引都按升序。The indexes in this collection are in ascending order. ## Examples 下面的示例枚举中的已选中的项若要查看内容检查项的状态处于。The following example enumerates the checked items in the to see what check state an item is in. 该示例演示如何使用属性来获取，和属性来获取。The example demonstrates using the property to get the , and the property to get the . 第一个循环使用方法以获取的每个选中的项，给定项的索引。The first loop uses the method to get the of each checked item, given the index of the item. 第二个循环也使用，但使用方法来检索项的索引。The second loop also uses , but uses the method to retrieve the index for the item. 若要运行此示例，请执行以下步骤：To run this example, perform the following steps: 1. 创建新的 Windows 窗体应用程序。Create a new Windows Forms application. 2. 添加和到窗体。Add a and a to the form. 3. 将该按钮命名`WhatIsChecked`，添加的处理程序其事件，并在以下处理程序的主体中的代码中的副本。Name the button `WhatIsChecked`, add a handler for its event, and copy in the code from the body of the following handler. 4. 某些将项添加到。Add some items to the . 5. 运行示例，并检查某些列表框中的复选框。Run the example and check some of the check boxes in the list box. 6. 单击按钮。Click the button. 你将看到一系列的消息框，指示签入的项。You will see a series of message boxes that indicate which items were checked. [!code-cpp[CheckedListBox#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CheckedListBox/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[CheckedListBox#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CheckedListBox/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CheckedListBox#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CheckedListBox/VB/source.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当选定项时是否应切换复选框。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the check box should be toggled when an item is selected.

value.span: 如果立即应用选中标记，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the check mark is applied immediately; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指示是否应切换复选框，每当选择项。 indicates whether the check box should be toggled whenever an item is selected. 默认行为是更改在第一次单击，选择，然后再次单击以应用复选标记的用户。The default behavior is to change the selection on the first click, and then have the user click again to apply the check mark. 在某些情况下，但是，你可能更喜欢具有项检查，只要单击它。In some instances, however, you might prefer have the item checked as soon as it is clicked. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何初始化通过设置， ，和属性。The following code example demonstrates initializing a control by setting the , , and properties. 该示例填充带控件和集到的控件属性。The example populates the with controls and sets the to the property of the control. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴在窗体包含名为`CheckedListBox1`并调用`InitializeCheckListBox`从窗体的构造函数或负载方法的方法。To run the example, paste the following code in a form containing a named `CheckedListBox1` and call the `InitializeCheckListBox` method from the form's constructor or Load method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGridExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGridExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGridExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGridExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGridExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGridExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Click As EventHandler

summary.span: 当用户单击 控件时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user clicks the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件传递给其事件处理程序中，因此它仅指示发生了单击操作。The event passes an to its event handler, so it only indicates that a click has occurred. 如果需要更具体的鼠标信息 （如按钮、 单击、 鼠标轮旋转或位置的数），使用和事件，将传递到事件处理程序。If you need more specific mouse information (such as the button, number of clicks, wheel rotation, or location), use the and events, which pass a to the event handler. 由用户的操作系统的鼠标设置确定一次双击。A double-click is determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system. 用户可以调整可以传递期间双击鼠标按钮点击之间的时间量。The user can adjust the amount of time that can pass between clicks during a double-click of a mouse button. 每次用户双击控件时引发事件。The event is raised every time the user double-clicks a control. 例如，如果你有的事件处理方法和事件的窗体中，双击窗体，这两个事件处理方法调用时引发事件。For example, if you have event-handling methods for the and events of a form, the events are raised when the form is double-clicked and both event-handling methods are called. 如果用户双击控件不支持事件，事件，可能会引发两次。If the user double-clicks a control that does not support the event, the event might be raised twice. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`CheckedListBox1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `CheckedListBox1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#157](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#157)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#157](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#157)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不显式调用 方法，则在引用 属性时将会调用此方法。If you do not explicitly call the method, it will be called when the property is referenced. > [!NOTE] > 要获取或设置属性，必须添加对引用`Accessibility`随.NET Framework 一起安装的程序集。To get or set the property, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the .NET Framework.

para.span: 在重写在派生类中，不应调用基类的方法。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, you should not call the base class's method.

summary.span: 获取创建控件句柄时所需要的创建参数。

span.span: Gets the required creation parameters when the control handle is created.
A that contains the required parameters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性不应重写，用于调整派生控件的属性。The property should not be overridden and used to adjust the properties of your derived control. 属性，如， ，和应设置在控件中的相应属性如，和。Properties such as the , , and should be set by the corresponding properties in your control such as , and . 包装标准 Windows 控件类或设置样式不是由 Windows 窗体命名空间时才应扩展。The should only be extended when you are wrapping a standard Windows control class or to set styles not provided by the Windows Forms namespace. 有关创建控制参数的详细信息，请参阅`CreateWindow`和`CreateWindowEx`函数和`CREATESTRUCT`Windows 平台 SDK 参考中的结构文档位于 MSDN 库http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。For more information about creating control parameters, see the `CreateWindow` and `CreateWindowEx` functions and the `CREATESTRUCT` structure documentation in the Windows Platform SDK reference located in the MSDN Library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library. ## Examples 下面的代码示例扩展属性派生类。The following code example extends the property of a derived class. 属性更改，这将导致按钮以显示而非。The property is changed, which causes the button to display an rather than an . 此示例要求你拥有从继承的类类。This example requires that you have a class that inherits from the class. [!code-cpp[CreateParams#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CreateParams/CPP/createparams.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[CreateParams#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CreateParams/CS/createparams.cs#3)] [!code-vb[CreateParams#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CreateParams/VB/createparams.vb#3)]

span.span: A string that specifies the name of a property of the objects contained in the list box.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下显示其包含的项的默认字符串。By default the displays the default string for the items it contains. 但是，可以显示不同类型的对象，并且你可能想要通过指定更改显示的字符串属性。However, the can display diverse types of objects and you may want to change the displayed string by specifying the property. 如果指定的属性不存在，或值属性为空字符串 ("")，该对象的结果改为显示方法。If the specified property does not exist, or the value of the property is an empty string (""), the results of the object's method are displayed instead. 如果的新值不能设置，维护以前的值。If the new value of the cannot be set, the previous value is maintained. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何初始化通过设置， ，和属性。The following code example demonstrates initializing a control by setting the , , and properties. 该示例填充带控件和集到的控件属性。The example populates the with controls and sets the to the property of the control. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴在窗体包含名为`CheckedListBox1`并调用`InitializeCheckListBox`从窗体的构造函数或负载方法的方法。To run the example, paste the following code in a form containing a named `CheckedListBox1` and call the `InitializeCheckListBox` method from the form's constructor or Load method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件由一个所有者绘制。This event is used by an owner-drawn . 引发事件时，才属性设置为或。The event is raised only when the property is set to or . 你可以使用此事件来执行绘制项所需的任务。You can use this event to perform the tasks needed to draw items in the . 如果你拥有一个可变大小的项 (即，设置为)，则绘制项之前，将引发事件。If you have a variable-sized item (that is, is set to ), the event is raised before the item is drawn. 你可以创建的事件处理程序事件，以指定要绘制事件处理程序中的项的大小事件。You can create an event handler for the event to specify the size for the item that you are going to draw in your event handler for the event. 此事件与此类无关。This event is not relevant to this class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event ItemCheck As ItemCheckEventHandler

summary.span: 当某项的选中状态更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the checked state of an item changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 直到会被更新的复选状态后事件发生。The check state is not updated until after the event occurs. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`CheckedListBox1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `CheckedListBox1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#156](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#156)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#156](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#156)]

Public Overrides Property ItemHeight As Integer
public: virtual property int ItemHeight { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取项区域的高度。

span.span: Gets the height of the item area.

value.span: 项区域的高度（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The height, in pixels, of the item area.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此测量值基于字体高度加上一个小边距来提供项周围的空白区域。This measurement is based on the font height plus a small margin to provide white space around the item. 当字体更改为 9.75 点 Arial"g"、"y"等字符的扩展部分不正确显示。The extenders of characters such as "g" and "y" do not display properly when the font is changed to 9.75-point Arial. 若要纠正此问题，派生类从，并重写返回`base.ItemHeight+2`。To correct this, derive a class from and override to return `base.ItemHeight+2`.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Items As CheckedListBox.ObjectCollection

summary.span: 获取该 中项的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of items in this .

value.span: 代表 中的项的 集合。

span.span: The collection representing the items in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使您能够获取对当前存储中的项列表的引用控件。The property enables you to obtain a reference to the list of items that are currently stored in a control. 通过此引用，可以将项添加、 删除项，并获取集合中项的计数。With this reference, you can add items, remove items, and obtain a count of the items in the collection. 可以使用项集合执行的任务的详细信息，请参阅类参考主题。For more information on the tasks that can be performed with the item collection, see the class reference topics. ## Examples 下面的示例枚举中的已选中的项若要查看内容检查项的状态处于。The following example enumerates the checked items in the to see what check state an item is in. 该示例使用属性来获取要检索其索引的项使用方法。The example uses the property to get the to retrieve the index of an item using the method. 该示例还演示了如何使用属性来获取，和属性来获取。The example also demonstrates using the property to get the , and the property to get the . 第一个循环使用方法以获取的每个选中的项，给定项的索引。The first loop uses the method to get the of each checked item, given the index of the item. 第二个循环也使用，但使用方法来检索项的索引。The second loop also uses , but uses the method to retrieve the index for the item. [!code-cpp[CheckedListBox#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CheckedListBox/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[CheckedListBox#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CheckedListBox/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CheckedListBox#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CheckedListBox/VB/source.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnClick(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnClick (e As EventArgs)

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法选择或清除复选框单击的项。The method selects or clears the check box of the item that is clicked. 如果属性设置为`true`，复选框切换从单击项的选中或清除状态第一个时间。If the property is set to `true`, the check box is switched from a selected or cleared state the first time the item is clicked. 否则，仅当已选定了项，则会切换复选框。Otherwise, the check box is switched only if the item is already selected. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在重写在派生类中，一定要调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定是否可以选择列表框中的一项或可以选择任何项。The property determines whether one item in the list box can be selected or no items can be selected. 有关不支持多个选择的对象。For objects, multiple selection is not supported. 可以将模式设置为一项或没有任何项。You can set the mode to one item or no items. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何初始化通过设置可允许在要选择的列表中的一个项。The following code example demonstrates initializing a control by setting the to allow one item in the list to be selected. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴在窗体包含名为`CheckedListBox1`并调用`InitializeCheckListBox`从窗体的构造函数或负载方法的方法。To run the example, paste the following code in a form containing a named `CheckedListBox1` and call the `InitializeCheckListBox` method from the form's constructor or Load method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法引发 事件。The method raises the event. 项其设置为`Indeterminate`显示带有复选标记中该复选框，但框为灰显，指示选中的项不确定状态。Items whose is set to `Indeterminate` appear with a check mark in the check box, but the box is grayed to indicate the indeterminate status of the checked item. ## Examples 下面的示例枚举中的项并检查列表中的每个其他项。The following example enumerates the items in the and checks every other item in the list. 该示例演示如何使用和方法来设置项的复选状态。The example demonstrates using the and methods to set the check state of an item. 要检查的每个其他项调用来设置到`Indeterminate`，虽然上要设置为选中的状态的其他项调用`Checked`。For every other item that is to be checked, is called to set the to `Indeterminate`, while is called on the other item to set the checked state to `Checked`. 该示例还演示了如何使用属性来获取获取的项。The example also demonstrates using the property to get the to get the of items. remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何初始化通过设置， ，和属性。The following code example demonstrates initializing a control by setting the , , and properties. 该示例填充带控件和集到的控件属性。The example populates the with controls and sets the to the property of the control. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴在窗体包含名为`CheckedListBox1`并调用`InitializeCheckListBox`从窗体的构造函数或负载方法的方法。To run the example, paste the following code in a form containing a named `CheckedListBox1` and call the `InitializeCheckListBox` method from the form's constructor or Load method. MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseCompatibleTextRendering { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值确定是使用 类 ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]) 还是 类 ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]) 呈现文本。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines whether to use the class ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]) or the class ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]) to render text.

value.span: 如果应使用类来执行兼容版本 1.0 和 1.1 文本呈现。

span.span: if the class should be used to perform text rendering for compatibility with versions 1.0 and 1.1.
of the .NET Framework; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `UseCompatibleTextRendering`属性旨在提供 visual Windows 窗体控件之间的兼容性，呈现文本使用类和[!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)]应用程序执行自定义文本呈现使用类。The `UseCompatibleTextRendering` property is intended to provide visual compatibility between Windows Forms controls that render text using the class and [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)] applications that perform custom text rendering using the class. 在大多数情况下，如果你的应用程序不正在升级从[!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)]或[!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)]，因此，建议你停`UseCompatibleTextRendering`设置的默认值为`false`。In most cases, if your application is not being upgraded from [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)], it is recommended that you leave `UseCompatibleTextRendering` set to the default value of `false`. [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]基于类中引入了[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]为了提高性能，使文本效果更好，并提高的国际字体支持。The [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] based class was introduced in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] to improve performance, make text look better, and improve support for international fonts. 在早期版本的[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]、[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]基于类用于执行所有文本呈现。In earlier versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)], the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] based class was used to perform all text rendering. [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] 计算字符间距和自动换行从的不同[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]。 calculates character spacing and word wrapping differently from [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]. 在 Windows 窗体应用程序中使用类呈现文本中，这可能会导致使用的控件的文本显示不同于应用程序中的其他文本。In a Windows Forms application that uses the class to render text, this could cause the text for controls that use to appear different from the other text in the application. 若要解决此不兼容性，你可以设置`UseCompatibleTextRendering`属性`true`对特定的控件。To resolve this incompatibility, you can set the `UseCompatibleTextRendering` property to `true` for a specific control. 若要设置`UseCompatibleTextRendering`到`true`应用程序中的所有受支持控件，调用方法的参数替换`true`。To set `UseCompatibleTextRendering` to `true` for all supported controls in the application, call the method with a parameter of `true`.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法以处理操作系统消息中标识结构。The following code example demonstrates overriding the method to handle operating system messages identified in the structure. 在此示例中了解另一个应用程序变为活动状态，以便处理 WM_ACTIVATEAPP 操作系统消息。The WM_ACTIVATEAPP operating system message is handled in this example to know when another application is becoming active. 请参阅平台 SDK 文档参考位于 MSDN 库http://msdn.microsoft.com/library以了解可用， ，和值。Refer to the Platform SDK documentation reference located in the MSDN Library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library to understand the available , , and values. 可以在 MSDN 库中也是可用平台 SDK （核心 SDK 部分） 下载中包含的 Windows.h 标头文件中找到实际的常量值http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。Actual constant values can be found in the Windows.h header file included in the Platform SDK (Core SDK section) download, which is also available in the MSDN Library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc/VB/form1.vb#1)]
